title: Such clubbing can be allowed for the schemes falling in same ward or adjoining ward or within the distance of 5 km
clause_text: Such clubbing can be allowed for the schemes falling in same ward or adjoining ward or within the distance of 5 km.
section: 33(11)Provisions relating to Permanent Transit Camp tenements for Slum Rehabilitation Scheme:
